Name: The Sad Onion
Description: Increases Tears by 0.7.

Name: The Inner Eye
Description: Grants triple shot but decreases tears.

Name: Spoon Bender
Description: Grants Isaac homing tears.

Name: Cricket's Head
Description: Increases damage by 0.5, and multiplies it by 1.5x.

Name: My Reflection
Description: Gives Isaac's tears a boomerang effect, and increases range and shot speed.

Name: Number One
Description: +1.5 tears, -17.62 range

Name: Blood of the Martyr
Description: Increases Damage by 1, and turns Isaac's tears into blood tears.

Name: Brother Bobby
Description: Follows Isaac around shooting normal tears.

Name: Skatole
Description: All types of fly except Boom Fly and Red Boom Fly become passive and slowly move towards Isaac. Does not prevent contact damage.

Name: Halo of Flies
Description: Spawns two pretty fly familiars that block enemy shots and deal contact damage to enemies.

Name: 1up!
Description: Gives an extra life. Upon death, you will respawn in the previous room with full health and lose the 1up!.

Name: Magic Mushroom
Description: Increases most stats, enlarges Isaac, grants a heart container and restores all health.

Name: The Virus
Description: Inflicts poison to enemies who make contact with Isaac. Speed down.

Name: Roid Rage
Description: Increases speed by 0.6, range by 5.25, and tear height by 0.5.
Grants Isaac one red heart container and fully restores Isaac's health.

Name: Raw Liver
Description: Grants 2 Heart Containers and completely restores health.

Name: Skeleton Key
Description: Sets your key count to the maximum of 99.

Name: A Dollar
Description: Gives Isaac 99 coins. Can be found multiple times in a single playthrough.

Name: Boom!
Description: Grants 10 bombs.

Name: Transcendence
Description: Grants flight.

Name: The Compass
Description: Reveals all special rooms (except secret rooms of any kind).

Name: Lunch
Description: Adds 1 heart container.

Name: Dinner
Description: Adds 1 heart container.

Name: Dessert
Description: Grants Isaac one full red heart container.

Name: Breakfast
Description: Grants Isaac one full red heart container.

Name: Rotten Meat
Description: Adds one heart container.

Name: Wooden Spoon
Description: Increases speed by 0.3.

Name: The Belt
Description: Increases speed by 0.3.

Name: Mom's Underwear
Description: Increases range.

Name: Mom's Heels
Description: Increases range.

Name: Mom's Lipstick
Description: Increases range and shot height.

Name: Wire Coat Hanger
Description: Increases Tears by 0.7.

Name: The Bible
Description: Upon activation, Isaac gains flight, allowing him to pass over all obstacles in the current room. Instantly kills Mom, Mom's Heart, and It Lives when activated, but will kill Isaac when activated while fighting Satan.

Name: The Book of Belial
Description: Upon use increases damage by 2 for the current room and by a further +50% if the character also has the Blood of the Martyr.

Name: The Necronomicon
Description: Damages all enemies in the room significantly.

Name: The Poop
Description: Spawns a pile of poop where the character is standing and knocks nearby monsters back. May yield pickups like regular poop.

Name: Mr. Boom
Description: Drops a large bomb.

Name: Tammy's Head
Description: Shoots 10 tears in a circle around Isaac, which retain the damage, shot speed, and special effects (such as poison) of Isaac's tears.

Name: Mom's Bra
Description: Upon use, petrifies all enemies in the current room for approximately 4 seconds.

Name: Kamikaze!
Description: Creates an explosion in the same area as Isaac, dealing half a heart of damage to him and also damaging all enemies caught in the blast radius.

Name: Mom's Pad
Description: Upon use, inflicts fear to all enemies in the room for 5 seconds.

Name: Bob's Rotten Head
Description: Upon use, Isaac holds a poison bomb which can be thrown towards any of the four cardinal points and explodes on impact.

Name: Teleport
Description: Teleports you to a random room on the level.

Name: Yum Heart
Description: Restores 1 whole red heart.

Name: Lucky Foot
Description: +1 Luck. Increases chance of winning Shell Game Beggar. (Independent of luck stat)

Name: Doctor's Remote
Description: Sets a big red target on the ground (similar to the Epic Fetus item) which can be controlled with tear controls. After 6 seconds or by pressing space again, a huge explosive missile hits it, which damages all enemies caught in its blast radius.

Name: Cupid's Arrow
Description: Grants Isaac piercing tears that travel through enemies (but not obstacles) instead of breaking on impact with them.

Name: Shoop Da Whoop!
Description: Fires a laser from Isaac's mouth.

Name: Steven
Description: Increases Damage by 1.

Name: Pentagram
Description: Increases damage and increases the chance for a Devil or Angel Room to appear.

Name: Dr. Fetus
Description: Tears are replaced by bombs that benefit from bomb-enhancing effects and slide for a fixed time after being fired.

Name: Magneto
Description: Pulls pickups towards Isaac.

Name: Treasure Map
Description: Reveals all rooms for every floor. However, it does not reveal icons or secret rooms.

Name: Mom's Eye
Subname: Eye in the back of your head
Description: Allows Isaac to fire tears from the back of his head.

Name: Lemon Mishap
Description: Creates a small yellow pool of creep, which damages enemies that cross it.

Name: Distant Admiration
Description: A red attack fly circles further out than the Halo of Flies / Pretty Flies, but closer than Forever Alone. Deals more damage than Forever Alone.

Name: Book of Shadows
Description: Upon use, creates a protective shield nullifying all types of damage for 10 seconds.

Name: The Ladder
Description: Allows Isaac to walk across gaps one square across by automatically placing a ladder between the two walkable sections.

Name: Charm of the Vampire
Description: Heals the character for half of a red heart for every 13 monsters killed.

Name: The Battery
Description: Activated Items can be "overcharged" to allow for an additional use.

Name: Steam Sale
Description: Reduces all Shop prices by 50%, rounded down to 7 coins for an item, rounded up to 2-3 coins for a pickup.

Name: Anarchist Cookbook
Description: Spawns six troll bombs around the room.

Name: The Hourglass
Description: Upon activation, enemies and their projectiles are slowed down for a short duration.

Name: Sister Maggy
Description: A familiar that follows Isaac around shooting blood tears.

Name: Technology
Description: Replaces tears with a piercing laser with unlimited range.

Name: Chocolate Milk
Description: Grants charged tears that deal greater damage when fully charged.

Name: Growth Hormones
Description: Increases damage by 1 and speed by 0.4.

Name: Mini Mush
Description: Increases Speed and Shot Height and decreases Isaac's size, but lowers Range.

Name: Rosary
Description: Adds 3 Soul Hearts and increases the chance for The Bible to appear in any item pool.

Name: Cube of Meat
Description: Orbiting familiar that blocks enemy shots and deals damage to enemies. If collected while already having one, makes the familiar evolve. Only drops from Horsemen. Similar to Ball of Bandages.

Name: A Quarter
Description: Adds 25 to Isaac's coin count, capping at 99.

Name: PHD
Description: Converts all bad pills into good pills, spawns one pill pickup and restores health. Identifies all pills upon pickup.

Name: X-Ray Vision
Description: Reveals and opens all Secret Room and Super Secret Room entrances.

Name: My Little Unicorn
Description: Upon use, grants invulnerability and increased speed for five seconds, removing the ability to shoot tears and replacing it with the ability to deal contact damage to enemies.

Name: Book of Revelations
Description: Adds 1 soul heart, increases the chance for a Devil or Angel Room to appear, and increases the chance for the next boss to be a Horseman (except on XL floors and floors with fixed bosses such as Mom).

Name: The Mark
Description: Increases Damage and Speed, plus adds one Soul Heart.

Name: The Pact
Description: Increases damage by 0.5, tears by 0.7 and grants two soul hearts upon pickup.

Name: Dead Cat
Description: Sets the amount of red heart containers to 1, but gives Isaac 9 extra lives. After dying, Isaac is teleported to the last safe room. New heart containers can be obtained after picking up this item, but after each death, the number of heart containers is set to 1 again.

Name: Lord of the Pit
Description: Grants flight and increases speed.

Name: The Nail
Description: Adds one soul heart and allows the breaking of rocks and damaging enemies by simply walking over them. Increases damage and decreases speed. All effects except for the Soul Heart wear off upon leaving the room.

Name: We Need to Go Deeper!
Description: Creates a trapdoor to go to the next floor. If used in The Womb, it will create a trapdoor to Sheol, even if the player hasn't unlocked it.

Name: Deck of Cards
Description: Gives Isaac a random tarot card.

Name: Monstro's Tooth
Description: Monstro jumps onto a random enemy, doing area damage. Can damage/kill the player if summoned in an room without enemies.

Name: Loki's Horns
Description: Gives a random chance for projectiles to fire in all 4 cardinal directions.

Name: Little Chubby
Description: A familiar that charges forward and deals touch damage to any enemies in its path.

Name: Spider Bite
Description: Adds a chance to shoot slowing tears, reducing speed of enemy movement and any projectile fired by them.

Name: The Small Rock
Description: Increases damage by 1, increases tears by 0.2, and decreases speed by 0.1.

Name: Spelunker Hat
Description: Reveals type of adjacent rooms, including location for secret rooms and super secret rooms.

Name: Super Bandage
Description: Grants one Heart Container and gives 2 Soul Hearts.

Name: The Gamekid
Description: Upon use, turns the character into a into a Pac-Man-like creature for 5 seconds, granting invulnerability, inflicting fear on all enemies, and replenishing half a red heart container for every two enemies killed.

Name: Sack of Pennies
Description: Isaac is followed by a small bag that drops a coin every 2 rooms.

Name: Robo-Baby
Description: Follows Isaac around, shooting enemies with an eye laser similar to Technology.

Name: Little C.H.A.D.
Description: A familiar who will drop a half red heart every 3 rooms.

Name: The Book of Sin
Description: Spawns a random pickup, pill, card, or trinket.

Name: The Relic
Description: Isaac is followed by a small blue cross that will drop a Soul Heart every 5-6 rooms.

Name: Little Gish
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires slowing tears, impeding enemies' speed.

Name: Little Steven
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires homing tears.

Name: The Halo
Description: Grants one Heart Container, +0.3 Damage, +0.2 Tears, +0.25 Range, +0.3 Speed, and +0.5 Tear Height.

Name: Mom's Bottle of Pills
Description: Gives Isaac a random pill, and will cause him to drop any held Q-slot item (If any). The player will only receive six different pill types in one playthrough.

Name: The Common Cold
Description: Adds a chance to shoot poison tears, dealing damage over time when inflicted.

Name: The Parasite
Description: Isaac's tears split in two when they hit something.

Name: The D6
Description: Allows Isaac to re-roll collectible items in the current room into other items, depending on the current room's Item Pool.

Name: Mr. Mega
Description: Gives Isaac 5 bombs, and makes all dropped bombs larger, which have an increased blast radius and increased damage.

Name: The Pinking Shears
Description: Separates Isaac's head and body for the current room. Isaac's head, which now has flight, will be under the player's control, while his body will seek out enemies to attack by contact damage.

Name: The Wafer
Description: All sources of damage that would cause more than one half heart of damage are reduced to one half heart instead.

Name: Money = Power
Description: Increases damage by 0.04 for every coin Isaac has, up to +3.96 damage at 99 coins.

Name: Mom's Contacts
Description: Adds a chance to shoot petrifying tears, which stop enemies in place and prevent them from moving or attacking. Range up.

Name: The Bean
Description: Isaac releases bad gas, poisoning any enemy in close vicinity.

Name: Guardian Angel
Description: Spawns an orbital familiar that blocks enemy projectiles, deals contact damage to enemies, and increases the speed of all orbital familiars.

Name: Demon Baby
Description: Follows Isaac and automatically fires at enemies in its reach.

Name: Mom's Knife
Description: Isaac's tears are replaced by a knife that pierces enemies, can travel through obstacles, and can hurt enemies while Isaac is holding it. Holding down the fire button before firing increases its range and power.

Name: Ouija Board
Description: Grants spectral tears that travel through obstacles (but not enemies) instead of breaking on impact with them.

Name: 9 Volt
Description: Reduces the charge of any Activated Items by 1. Any 1 charge items instead have timed recharges.

Name: Dead Bird
Description: Spawns a flying familiar for the current room that chases enemies whenever Isaac takes damage.

Name: Brimstone
Description: Tears are replaced by a laser beam that pierces through all enemies and obstacles in its path and deals high damage. Can only be fired after a short charge-up period.

Name: Blood Bag
Description: Grants one red heart container, restores 5 red hearts, and increases speed by 0.3.

Name: Odd Mushroom
Description: +1.7 tears, +0.3 speed, reduces damage.

Name: Odd Mushroom
Description: Grants an empty heart container. Increases damage, range and shot height while reducing speed.

Name: Whore of Babylon
Description: Increases damage and speed whenever Isaac has half a red heart or less (one red heart for Eve), ignoring any soul or black hearts.

Name: Monster Manual
Description: Summons a random familiar for the current room. Can summon familiars not yet unlocked.

Name: Dead Sea Scrolls
Description: Triggers the effect of a random activated item from a list of possible options (not every activated item is included).

Name: Bobby-Bomb
Description: Gives Isaac 5 Bombs, and causes all dropped bombs to home towards the closest enemy.

Name: Razor Blade
Description: Upon use, deals one heart of damage to Isaac and grants +1.2 damage for the current room.

Name: Forget Me Now
Description: When activated, the level ends and is freshly regenerated with new rooms, monsters, and items. Disappears after use.

Name: Forever Alone
Description: Spawns a blue attack fly that orbits a long distance from Isaac.

Name: Bucket of Lard
Description: Grants two empty heart containers and heals Isaac by half a heart, but decreases speed by 0.2.

Name: A Pony
Description: Passively grants flight and increased speed. Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, becoming invulnerable during the charge and damaging enemies.

Name: Bomb Bag
Description: Isaac is followed by a small bag that drops a Bomb, 1+1 Free, or a Troll Bomb every 3 rooms.

Name: A Lump of Coal
Description: The more distance tears travel, the more damage they will do.

Name: Guppy's Paw
Description: Removes one red heart container in exchange for gaining 3 Soul Hearts.

Name: Guppy's Tail
Description: Increases chance of finding gold chests and normal chests, but reduces chance of finding pickups.

Name: IV Bag
Description: Upon activation, Isaac loses a half-heart (one whole heart in The Womb onwards) for a random amount of coins, similar to the blood donation machine.

Name: Best Friend
Description: Deploys a decoy Isaac that eventually explodes with an increased blast radius.

Name: Remote Detonator
Description: Bombs you place explode only when you use this item. Gives 5 bombs.

Name: Stigmata
Description: Increases damage, and adds 1 heart container.

Name: Mom's Purse
Description: Allows Isaac to hold 1 additional trinket.

Name: Bob's Curse
Description: Gives 5 bombs and grants all bombs poison effect.

Name: Pageant Boy
Description: Spawns several coins around Isaac.

Name: Scapular
Description: Once per room, when Isaac is reduced to his last half red Heart, the aura around his head temporarily vanishes and he is granted one Soul Heart.

Name: Speed Ball
Description: Increases speed by 0.3 and shot speed by 20%.

Name: Bum Friend
Description: A portable beggar who follows Isaac, picks up coins for himself, and occasionally drops a pickup after collecting a coin. Does not spawn collectibles.

Name: Guppy's Head
Description: Spawns 2-4 blue flies to damage enemies.

Name: Prayer Card
Description: Grants an eternal heart per use.

Name: Notched Axe
Description: Isaac holds the axe above his head for as long as the spacebar button is held (or until he leaves the room). While holding the axe, Isaac can break any rock he touches, but cannot attack or pick up other items.

Name: Infestation
Description: 1-3 blue flies randomly spawn every time Isaac gets hit.

Name: Ipecac
Description: Replaces tears with explosive and poisoning projectiles fired in an arc from the mouth.

Name: Tough Love
Description: Adds a chance to shoot a tooth instead of a tear, which deals greater damage than regular tears.

Name: The Mulligan
Description: Tears have a 1/6 chance of spawning allied blue flies when they hit an enemy.

Name: Technology 2
Description: Decreases damage and replaces right eye tears with a unlimited range, piercing laser which fires continuously.

Name: Mutant Spider
Description: Grants quadruple shot but decreases tears.

Name: Chemical Peel
Description: Tears fired from left eye do increased damage.

Name: The Peeper
Description: Spawns a familiar that floats slowly around the room on a zig-zag pattern similar to Boom Flies damaging enemies it passes through.

Name: Habit
Description: When Isaac is hit, 1 point of an item's charge is filled.

Name: Bloody Lust
Description: Increases damage as Isaac receives damage. Damage increase stays for the whole floor.

Name: Crystal Ball
Description: Reveals the map (except the Super Secret Room) and drops a random Tarot Card or soul heart.

Name: Spirit of the Night
Description: Grants spectral tears and flight.

Name: Crack the Sky
Description: Summons multiple beams of light in random locations around the room, dealing a large amount of damage to any enemy that touches them.

Name: Ankh
Description: Upon death, the player will respawn as ??? with 3 soul hearts.

Name: Celtic Cross
Description: Grants a chance to trigger the Book of Shadows effect upon taking damage, creating a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 7 seconds.

Name: Ghost Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires spectral tears.

Name: The Candle
Description: Throws out a blue flame that can pass over gaps (but not through rocks). The flame damages anything in its path.

Name: Cat-O-Nine-Tails
Description: Increases Shot Speed and damage.

Name: D20
Description: Rerolls all pickups in the current room.

Name: Harlequin Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires two tears at once in a V-pattern.

Name: Epic Fetus
Description: Isaac's tears are replaced with guided missiles, like those used by the Doctor's Remote.

Name: Polyphemus
Description: Makes Isaac shoot one huge tear. Also reduces Tears to minimum. Damage increased . If tear does more damage than an enemy's life, the tear continues to travel with the extra remaining damage.

Name: Daddy Longlegs
Description: Daddy Long Legs' shadow follows Isaac and stomps on enemies.

Name: Spider Butt
Description: Damages all enemies in the room and slows them and their projectiles down.

Name: Sacrificial Dagger
Description: Dagger orbits Isaac, dealing very high damage.

Name: Mitre
Description: Grants a chance of converting any red hearts pickups into soul hearts instead.

Name: Rainbow Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and fires tears with random effects.

Name: Dad's Key
Description: Opens all doors in the current room when activated, including doors which require a key to open and entrances to secret rooms. Opens the big doors in the first room of both The Chest and the Dark Room.

Name: Stem Cells
Description: Adds one filled heart container and increases Shot Speed.

Name: Portable Slot
Description: Upon activation, 1 coin will be consumed, and a random pickup may drop, similar to the slot machine.

Name: Holy Water
Description: When Isaac receives damage, the bottle breaks and a puddle of blue creep forms, which damages non-flying enemies, similar to Lemon Mishap. The bottle is reformed upon entering a different room.

Name: Fate
Description: Grants flight and one eternal heart.

Name: The Black Bean
Description: When taking damage, Isaac farts, causing poison damage to all enemies in range.

Name: White Pony
Description: Passively grants flight and increased speed. Upon use, Isaac charges in the direction the pony is facing, becoming invulnerable during the charge and damaging enemies while also casting the effect of Crack the Sky.

Name: Sacred Heart
Description: Increases damage and range while reducing shot speed and grants homing tears. Grants a Heart Container and replenishes all Red Hearts.

Name: Toothpicks
Description: +0.7 tears, +16% shot speed.

Name: Holy Grail
Description: Grants flight and one heart container.

Name: Dead Dove
Description: Grants spectral tears and flight.

Name: Blood Rights
Subname: Mass enemy damage at a cost
Description: Damages all enemies in the room, but deals a heart of damage to Isaac with each use.

Name: Guppy's Hair Ball
Description: Loosely follows behind Isaac. Can be swung like a flail by rapidly spinning Isaac in a circle. Grows bigger by killing enemies.

Name: Abel
Description: A familiar that mirrors the player's movements and shoots in the opposite direction.

Name: SMB Super Fan
Description: Increases all stats.

Name: Pyro
Description: Adds 99 bombs.

Name: 3 Dollar Bill
Description: Gives Isaac a random tear effect every room.

Name: Telepathy for Dummies
Description: Upon activation, grants homing tears for the current room.

Name: MEAT!
Description: Adds a heart container and increases damage.

Name: Magic 8 Ball
Description: Increases Shot Speed, and drops a tarot card when picked up.

Name: Mom's Coin Purse
Description: Spawns 4 random pills around Isaac.

Name: Squeezy
Description: Increases tears by 0.4, and spawns 2 Soul Hearts pickups.

Name: Jesus Juice
Description: Increases Damage and Range.

Name: Box
Description: Spawns 1 of each (non-collectible) item: 1 coin, 1 key, 1 bomb, 1 heart, 1 card, 1 pill, 1 trinket.

Name: Mom's Key
Description: Spawns 2 keys. Generates additional pickups from chests.

Name: Mom's Eyeshadow
Description: Tears have a chance to charm enemies.

Name: Iron Bar
Description: Increases damage by 0.3 and adds a chance to shoot concussive tears, causing enemies to walk around randomly.

Name: Midas' Touch
Description: Enemies that touch you are stunned and turn gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop a coin.

Name: Humbling Bundle
Description: Gives one extra pickup (1+1 Free version) of Red Hearts, pennies, bombs, and keys. Does not work with blue, black, and half red hearts, nickels, and dimes.

Name: Fanny Pack
Description: Has a chance to drop a random pickup when Isaac takes damage.

Name: Sharp Plug
Description: Using an activated item while it's not charged will charge it and Sharp Plug does 2 full heart damage to Isaac.

Name: Guillotine
Description: Isaac's head is removed from his body and floats around him. Increases Damage by 1 and grants -1 Tear Delay.

Name: Ball of Bandages
Description: Orbiting familiar that deals damage to enemies. If collected while already having one, makes the familiar evolve. Only drops from Horsemen. Similar to Cube of Meat.

Name: Champion Belt
Description: Increases damage, but also increases the chance of champion enemies appearing.

Name: Butt Bombs
Description: Gives +5 bombs and makes all bombs Butt Bombs that fill the room with gas, damaging and confusing all enemies.

Name: Gnawed Leaf
Description: After standing still and not shooting for a short time, Isaac turns invincible until he moves or shoots.

Name: Spider Baby
Description: When hit, spawns up to 2 blue spiders.

Name: Guppy's Collar
Description: Grants Isaac a permanent 50% chance to respawn with 1/2 of a red heart after death.

Name: Lost Contact
Description: Every tear has a small shield which will allow it to block one enemy projectile.

Name: Anemic
Description: +5 range. After Isaac is damaged, a trail of red creep will be left behind Isaac until he leaves the current room.

Name: Goat Head
Description: A Devil Room / Angel Room Door will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Utero II/Womb II.

Name: Ceremonial Robes
Description: Adds 3 black hearts and increases Damage by 1.

Name: Mom's Wig
Description: Adds a chance to spawn blue spiders when firing tears. Restores 1 red heart.

Name: Placenta
Description: Grants a full heart container, and a chance to regenerate a half-heart of health every minute of gameplay.

Name: Old Bandage
Description: Adds one empty heart container. Whenever Isaac takes damage there's a chance that a Red Heart may drop.

Name: Sad Bombs
Description: +5 Bombs. Upon exploding, bombs shoot 8 tears off in every direction, similar to Tammy's Head. The tears are affected by any tear modifiers Isaac has on his own tears.

Name: Rubber Cement
Description: Tears bounce off walls, enemies, and environmental objects.

Name: Anti-Gravity
Description: -2 Tear Delay. Tears float in position until firing ceases, after which they will fly off in the direction they were shot in.

Name: Pyromaniac
Description: Isaac heals 1 heart instead of taking damage from an explosive source. Adds 5 bombs.

Name: Cricket's Body
Description: Grants -1 Tear Delay and reduces Range. When tears hit an object or deplete their range, they spawn 4 smaller tears, whose Range and Damage scale with Isaac's.

Name: Gimpy
Description: Has a chance of spawning a soul heart or black heart when taking damage. Enemies have a chance to drop a Half Red Heart after being killed.

Name: Black Lotus
Description: Grants the player one red heart container, one soul heart, and one black heart.

Name: Piggy Bank
Description: Gives 3 pennies on pick-up. Every time Isaac is damaged, he will drop one additional penny.

Name: Mom's Perfume
Description: Adds a chance to shoot fear tears and decreases tear delay by 1.

Name: Monstro's Lung
Description: Increases damage and grants a charged shot that fires multiple tears in the same fashion as Monstro.

Name: Abaddon
Description: Increases damage and speed, removes all red heart containers, grants six black hearts, and adds a chance to shoot fear tears.

Name: Ball of Tar
Description: Adds a chance to shoot slowing tears and the character leaves a trail of slowing creep behind as he moves, impeding enemies' speed.

Name: Stop Watch
Subname: Let's slow this down a bit
Description: Automatically inflicts slow to all enemies in every room.

Name: Tiny Planet
Description: Range up and makes shot tears revolve around Isaac until they drop.

Name: Infestation 2
Description: Spawns allied blue spiders from killed enemies.

Name: E Coli
Description: Gives "Turdy Touch" Effect. Enemies that touch Isaac are changed into poop.

Name: Death's Touch
Description: Increases Damage by 1.5, reduces Tears by 0.3 and increases tear size. Grants piercing tears. Tears are replaced by Death's scythes, which is a cosmetic effect only.

Name: Key Piece 1
Description: Combined with Key Piece 2, unlocks the golden gate in the starting room of The Chest and Dark Room to fight Mega Satan.

Name: Key Piece 2
Description: Combined with Key Piece 1, unlocks the golden gate in the starting room of The Chest and Dark Room to fight Mega Satan.

Name: Experimental Treatment
Description: Randomly increases and decreases some of the character's stats.

Name: Contract From Below
Description: Doubles the number of pickups and chests spawned after clearing a room or performing some other triggering action (such as using a blood donation machine), but reduces the chance for any pickups to spawn at all.

Name: Infamy
Description: Chance to block projectiles coming from any direction.

Name: Trinity Shield
Description: Isaac gains a shield that protects him from enemy shots.

Name: Tech.5
Description: Grants a unlimited range piercing laser with random rate of fire that does not replace tears. The laser might occasionally fire with the effect of a random item or trinket, such as Hook Worm, Spoon Bender or Tiny Planet.
Grants double shot.

Name: Blue Map
Description: Shows secret and super secret room locations on the map.

Name: BFFS!
Description: Increases the size and damage of familiars.

Name: Hive Mind
Description: Increases the size of blue spiders and blue flies and doubles the amount of damage they deal.

Name: There's Options
Description: There will be 2 items available to choose from after defeating a boss. Choosing 1 item causes the other to disappear.

Name: Bogo Bombs
Description: All standard bomb pickups become 1+1 bomb pickups.

Name: Starter Deck
Description: Isaac can hold 2 cards at once and all pills are replaced by cards.

Name: Little Baggy
Description: Isaac can hold 2 pills at once and all cards are replaced by pills.

Name: Magic Scab
Description: Increases luck and HP by 1.

Name: Blood Clot
Description: Increases damage by 1 and range by 5 for tears fired from the left eye.

Name: Screw
Description: +0.5 tears up, +0.2 shot speed up.

Name: Hot Bombs
Description: Grants 5 bombs. Isaac's bombs leave behind fire that damages enemies upon contact.

Name: Fire Mind
Description: Grants flaming tears that deal burning damage over time. Tears have a chance to explode on impact with an enemy, which creates a fire at the location of the explosion.

Name: Missing No.
Description: Randomizes all passive items upon pickup and at the start of each succeeding floor.

Name: Dark Matter
Description: Increases Damage by 1 and adds a chance to shoot fear tears.

Name: Black Candle
Description: Prevents curses. Grants one black heart. Increases the chance for a Devil or angel room to appear.

Name: Proptosis
Description: Tears start out massive with high damage, and then shrink down and become weaker over a short range.

Name: Missing Page 2
Subname: Evil up. Your enemies will pay!
Description: Gives 1 black heart. Upon taking damage that reduces Isaac's health to one heart or less, activates The Necronomicon effect, dealing 40 damage to all enemies in the room.

Name: Smart Fly
Description: After Isaac takes damage, this fly will deal continuous touch damage to whatever enemy caused the damage until it is dead. The fly will then systematically attack 1 enemy at a time until the room is cleared.

Name: Dry Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and blocks enemy projectiles. Upon blocking a shot, it has a chance of triggering The Necronomicon effect.

Name: Juicy Sack
Description: A familiar that follows behind Isaac. It drips a trail of creep, which slows enemies, and spawns 1-2 blue spiders after each room.

Name: Robo-Baby 2.0
Subname: We worked out all the kinks
Description: Fires lasers at any enemy in its line of sight and moves based on the direction Isaac is firing tears.

Name: Rotten Baby
Description: A familiar that spawns blue flies.

Name: Headless Baby
Description: Familiar that follows Isaac, leaving blood creep on the ground.

Name: Leech
Description: Spawns a friendly familiar leech on the ground that hunts down enemies and heals you for half a heart each time it eats one.

Name: Mystery Sack
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops a heart, coin, bomb, or key every 5-6 rooms.

Name: BBF
Description: Spawns a familiar that flies around the room in a manner similar to the Boom Fly and explodes on contact with an enemy. Respawns after ten seconds.

Name: Bob's Brain
Description: Spawns a familiar that charges forward when shooting tears and explodes upon contact with an enemy, damaging and poisoning them. The familiar respawns after a few seconds.

Name: Best Bud
Description: When hit, summons a white attack fly similar to Distant Admiration for the current room.

Name: Lil' Brimstone
Description: A Familiar that shoots a thin Brimstone beam. Must charge like Brimstone before shooting.

Name: Isaac's Heart
Description: Isaac himself is now immune to all damage, and a heart familiar appears and follows Isaac. If the heart is hurt, Isaac is hurt.

Name: Lil Haunt
Description: A familiar that damages enemies by chasing them as well as inducing the fear effect.

Name: Dark Bum
Subname: He wants to take your life
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac around and collects red hearts. For every one-and-a-half red hearts collected, Dark Bum will generate one soul heart, one hostile Spider or one friendly blue spider.

Name: Big Fan
Description: Spawns a large orbital familiar that blocks enemy projectiles and deals slight contact damage to enemies.

Name: Sissy Longlegs
Description: Wanders about the room, occasionally spawning blue spiders.

Name: Punching Bag
Description: Spawns a Mulligan Familiar that will wander the room randomly. Enemies will attack the Mulligan if it's closer.

Name: How to Jump
Subname: It's about time you learned how
Description: Gives Isaac the ability to jump (over gaps, spikes, etc.).

Name: D100
Description: Upon use, rerolls all passive items on Isaac like the D4, every pedestal item in the room like The D6, and every pickup like the D20.

Name: D4
Description: Rerolls all of Isaac's items.

Name: D10
Description: Rerolls the enemies in a room. Only rerolls enemies that are still alive (does not spawn new enemies).

Name: Blank Card
Description: Has the same effect as the card or rune currently held by Isaac.

Name: Book of Secrets
Description: Upon use, gives the effect of Treasure Map, The Compass, or Blue Map for the duration of the current floor.

Name: Box of Spiders
Description: Summons 2-4 blue spiders.

Name: Red Candle
Description: Throws a persistent flame that deals high damage and diminishes as it damages enemies or blocks shots.

Name: The Jar
Description: When at full health, up to 4 extra hearts can be stored in the jar.

Name: Flush!
Description: Changes all enemies in the room into poop. Does not work on all enemies (Knights and bosses are immune). Instantly kills Dingle, Dangle, and Brownie.

Name: Satanic Bible
Description: Upon activation, Isaac gains a black heart.

Name: Head of Krampus
Description: Fires a cross-patterned brimstone shot, just like The Fallen and Krampus shoot.

Name: Butter Bean
Description: Isaac farts and pushes back nearby enemies.

Name: Magic Fingers
Description: For 1 coin, damages all enemies in the room.

Name: Converter
Description: When used, converts two soul hearts into a heart container.

Name: Pandora's Box
Description: Upon use, spawns certain pickups or items depending on the floor it is used on. Single-use.

Name: Unicorn Stump
Description: Upon use, grants invulnerability and increased speed for five seconds, but removes the ability to shoot tears.

Name: Taurus
Description: Speed down; gains speed while in a room with enemies until gaining My Little Unicorn effect for a few seconds.

Name: Aries
Description: +0.25 Speed. Running into enemies while at a high speed will deal 18 points of damage. Does not prevent contact damage.

Name: Cancer
Description: Adds 3 soul hearts. Grants The Wafer effect for the current room upon taking damage.

Name: Leo
Description: Allows you to crush rocks when you walk over them.

Name: Virgo
Description: Grants a chance to trigger the Book of Shadows effect upon taking damage, creating a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 10 seconds. Also converts "bad pills" into "good pills".

Name: Libra
Description: Gives 6 coins, 6 bombs, and 6 keys and balances out all attributes.

Name: Scorpio
Description: Grants poison tears, which deal damage over time when inflicted.

Name: Sagittarius
Description: Increases speed by +0.2 and grants piercing tears.

Name: Capricorn
Description: All stats up.

Name: Aquarius
Description: A trail of blue creep is left behind Isaac, which damages enemies.

Name: Pisces
Description: -1 Tear Delay, adds knock-back shots and increases tear size.

Name: Eve's Mascara
Description: Doubles damage, halves tears stat, and greatly reduces shot speed.

Name: Judas' Shadow
Description: Adds an extra life; upon death, it respawns Isaac as Black Judas with only two black hearts.

Name: Maggy's Bow
Description: Gives one heart container and doubles the healing provided by red hearts.

Name: Holy Mantle
Description: Automatically negates first taken damage in every room.

Name: Thunder Thighs
Subname: HP up + speed down + you feel stompy
Description: Destroys rocks upon contact with Isaac. Adds one heart container and lowers Speed.

Name: Strange Attractor
Description: Pickups, trinkets, and monsters are magnetically attracted to Isaac's tears.

Name: Cursed Eye
Description: Grants charged tears that can be fired in a tight burst of four. Getting hit while charging will teleport Isaac into another room.

Name: Mysterious Liquid
Description: Tears leave a small, short lasting pool of creep on impact or when their range is depleted.

Name: Gemini
Description: Suture becomes attached to Isaac, and does touch damage to enemies within its attacking range.

Name: Cain's Other Eye
Description: Spawns a familiar that floats slowly around the room on a zig-zag pattern similar to The Peeper and shoots normal tears in the same direction as Isaac.

Name: ???'s Only Friend
Description: Summons a big attack fly that can be controlled with the shooting direction-keys.

Name: Samson's Chains
Description: Pull a chain and ball behind you that will damage enemies on contact and is able to break stones.

Name: Mongo Baby
Description: Summons a familiar that copies the tears of Isaac's other familiars.

Name: Isaac's Tears
Description: Shoots 8 tears around Isaac, which retain the damage, shot speed, and special effects of his tears. Each tear shot by Isaac increases item charge by one.

Name: Undefined
Description: Teleports Isaac to either the Secret Room, Super Secret Room, Treasure Room, or I AM ERROR.

Name: Scissors
Description: Upon use, turns Isaac's head into a stationary familiar for the current room which fires normal tears that deal 3.5 damage.

Name: Breath of Life
Description: Grants a brief moment of invincibility when the charge bar hits zero. If the spacebar is held for an additional second after hitting zero, Isaac will take damage.

Name: The Polaroid
Description: If the character has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, it triggers the Book of Shadows effect, creating a shield that nullifies all types of damage for 5 seconds. Also allows entrance into The Chest.

Name: The Negative
Description: If the character has half a red heart or no red hearts after taking damage, it triggers The Necronomicon effect, damaging all enemies in the room. Also allows entrance into the Dark Room.

Name: The Ludovico Technique
Description: Instead of firing tears, Isaac controls one floating tear that hover over obstacles. This tear deals constant damage when held in place over an enemy.

Name: Soy Milk
Description: Tears shrink and do much less damage, but fire in very rapid succession.

Name: Godhead
Description: Increases damage and range while reducing tears and shot speed. Grants homing tears and tears gain a damaging halo.

Name: Lazarus' Rags
Description: Upon dying, resurrect as Revived Lazarus with one heart container and Anemic item.

Name: The Mind
Description: Grants the combined effects of the Blue Map, Treasure Map, and The Compass, revealing the floor layout and all special rooms, including Secret Rooms and Super Secret Rooms.

Name: The Body
Description: Adds 3 heart containers.

Name: The Soul
Description: Grants two soul hearts. Isaac now repels enemy projectiles.

Name: Dead Onion
Description: Grants piercing and spectral tears. Increases tear size (without increasing damage) while greatly reducing range and shot speed.

Name: Broken Watch
Description: Chance upon entering a room to slow down or speed up every enemy and their attacks. The chance to slow enemies is quite higher than the chance to speed them up.

Name: The Boomerang
Description: Throws a short-range boomerang which does a bit of damage and has a high chance to stun the enemy for 2 seconds. Can also be used to grab pickups.

Name: Safety Pin
Description: Increases range and shot speed, while adding 1 Black Heart.

Name: Caffeine Pill
Description: Increases speed and reduces character size. Also gives a random pill.

Name: Torn Photo
Description: Tears + Shot speed up.

Name: Blue Cap
Subname: HP + tears up + shot speed down
Description: Grants 1 heart container and increases tears, but decreases shot speed.

Name: Latch Key
Description: Increases Luck by 1, grants 1 Soul Heart and spawns 2 Keys.

Name: Match Book
Description: Grants Isaac 1 Black Heart and 3 bombs. Can also give troll bombs.

Name: Synthoil
Description: Increases damage by 1, range by 5.25, and tear height by 0.5.

Name: A Snack
Description: Grants one full red heart container.

Name: Diplopia
Description: Duplicates all pickups and item pedestals in the room.

Name: Placebo
Description: When used, copies the effect of the pill Isaac is currently holding without consuming it. Does not copy the effects of cards or runes.

Name: Wooden Nickel
Description: When used, has a 50% chance to drop one random type of coin (penny, nickel, or dime).

Name: Toxic Shock
Description: Upon entering a room, poisons all enemies, dealing double Isaac's tear damage. Killing enemies leaves a small, short lasting pool of green creep on the ground.

Name: Mega Bean
Description: When used, the Mega Bean will freeze all enemies in the current room for a couple of seconds, deal 5 damage and poison any enemies near Isaac, and send a wave of spikes that deals 10 damage across the room in the direction Isaac is facing.

Name: Glass Cannon
Description: Reduces Isaac's health to half a heart (including soul and black hearts) and fires one large piercing spectral tear that does a lot of damage when used. The damage done by Glass Cannon scales with Isaac's damage (at base damage it does 45 damage).

Name: Bomber Boy
Description: +5 bombs. Isaac's bombs will now explode in a large cross-shaped pattern (roughly 5 bombs explosions wide). This also affects player-spawned troll bombs.

Name: Crack Jacks
Description: Adds one heart container and drops a random trinket.

Name: Mom's Pearls
Description: +1.25 Range Up. +0.5 Tear Height. +1 Luck Up.

Name: Car Battery
Description: Causes Isaac's activated item to activate twice on each use.

Name: Box of Friends
Description: Upon use, duplicates all of Isaac's familiars for the current room.

Name: The Wiz
Description: Tears simultaneously fire out of both eyes diagonally, similar to the effect of the R U A Wizard? pill. Isaac's tears also travel above all obstacles.

Name: 8 Inch Nails
Description: +1.5 Damage Up. Replaces Isaac's tears with nails, which have increased knockback.

Name: Incubus
Description: A demonic familiar that follows Isaac and shoots tears identical to Isaac's in terms of damage, range, fire rate, and effects.

Name: Fate's Reward
Description: A blue head familiar that will follow Isaac and fire tears copying his tear effects and damage.

Name: Lil Chest
Description: Spawns a chest familiar that follows Isaac and drops a random pickup every few rooms.

Name: Sworn Protector
Description: An orbital angel which does 7 contact damage per tick and blocks enemy shots. Upon blocking 10 shots in a room it drops an eternal heart.

Name: Friend Zone
Description: A white orbiting fly which deals 3 contact damage per tick to enemies. This familiar orbits Isaac at a middle length distance somewhere between Distant Admiration and Forever Alone.

Name: Lost Fly
Description: A familiar fly that moves in a straight line and attaches itself to the first obstacle or wall it comes into contact with in each room. If any enemies walk into its path, it will deal 7 contact damage per tick. If the obstacle it is attached to is destroyed then it will continue rolling in the direction it was previously travelling until it meets another wall or obstacle.

Name: Scatter Bombs
Subname: We put bombs in your bombs!
Description: Adds 5 bombs. Isaac's bombs explode into 2-4 tiny bombs.

Name: Sticky Bombs
Description: +5 bombs. Bombs stick to enemies and spawn 2-4 blue spiders if they kill an enemy.

Name: Epiphora
Description: Shooting in one direction increases Isaac's rate of fire until the cap is reached. As soon as Isaac changes direction or stops shooting, rate of fire is reset to its normal amount.

Name: Continuum
Description: +2.25 Range Up. +1.5 Tear Height. Isaac's tears travel through walls and appear out of the opposite wall. Isaac's tears also travel over rocks and objects.

Name: Mr. Dolly
Description: Tears and Range up. Spawns 3 random types of hearts on the floor when picked up.

Name: Curse of the Tower
Description: Causes Isaac to spawn 6 troll bombs on the floor every time he gets hit, similar to the Anarchist Cookbook mechanic.

Name: Charged Baby
Description: A familiar that may drop a Little Battery. Has a small chance to freeze all enemies in the room.

Name: Dead Eye
Description: Isaac's damage increases each time an enemy is hit. Damage is reset upon missing a shot.

Name: Holy Light
Description: Isaac has a random chance to fire a Holy tear, which, when it hits an enemy, will spawn a Crack the Sky-style light beam on the same enemy, dealing damage.

Name: Host Hat
Description: A host familiar that sits on Isaac's head and has a random chance to block enemy shots and retaliate with 3 tears. Grants immunity to explosions.

Name: Restock
Description: Causes shops to instantly restock their items when they are bought. Granted by default for every character in Greed Mode.

Name: Bursting Sack
Description: Spider enemies no longer target or deal contact damage to Isaac.

Name: No. 2
Description: Continuously firing tears for several seconds causes Isaac to drop a Butt Bomb. Butt Bombs explode for 60 damage like normal bombs, but also deal 10 damage to all enemies in the room and daze them for a short period of time.

Name: Pupula Duplex
Description: Transforms Isaac's tears into a wide arc shape which gives them a much larger hitbox. Gives Isaac spectral tears which allows them to travel through objects in the environment (i.e. rocks).

Name: Pay to Play
Description: This item turns all doors that require a single key into doors which need a coin to enter instead. This affects shops, item rooms and libraries.

Name: Eden's Blessing
Description: +0.7 tears up. Grants a random item at the start of the next run.

Name: Friendly Ball
Description: Throwing the ball at an enemy instantly kills it and captures it. The captured enemy can later be released and will be friendly, fighting for Isaac and persisting between rooms.

Name: Tear Detonator
Description: When used, will detonate any tears currently on the screen and cause each one to split into 6 more tears which will fire in a circle, similar to Tammy's Head.

Name: Lil Gurdy
Description: Gives Isaac a Gurdy familiar that will charge around the room dealing contact damage to enemies. Lil Gurdy is charged by holding down a fire button and letting go. The longer the button is held, the faster Lil Gurdy will fling itself across the screen. Lil Gurdy can pass over objects and obstacles in the room.

Name: Bumbo
Description: Spawns a beggar familiar which floats around the room and picks up any nearby coins, leveling up after collecting several coins. At level 2, Bumbo gains a body. At level 3, it begins to fire tears. At level 4, Bumbo chases enemies slowly, dealing contact damage.

Name: D12
Description: Re-rolls all rocks in the current room into other random objects, such as bomb rocks, metal blocks, TNT, or poops.

Name: Censer
Description: Gives Isaac a golden censer familiar which creates a huge aura of light that slows down any enemies and enemy shots inside it.

Name: Key Bum
Description: Spawns a portable key master that follows Isaac and collects keys, giving random chests in return.

Name: Rune Bag
Description: A bag that follows Isaac and drops a random rune every 5-6 rooms.

Name: Seraphim
Description: An angel familiar which follows Isaac and fires homing tears which deal 10 damage at -25% shot speed and a reduced fire rate.

Name: Betrayal
Description: Every time Isaac takes damage, a charm effect is applied to every enemy in the room, causing them to attack each other rather than Isaac.

Name: Zodiac
Description: Zodiac will give Isaac a random zodiac item effect that changes after every floor.

Name: Serpent's Kiss
Description: Tears now have a random chance to apply a poison effect, causing 4 or 6 damage per tick to enemies (Similar to The Common Cold item). Isaac now deals poison damage on contact with enemies similar to The Virus item (Damage over time 4 or 6 per tick). Enemies that were poisoned have a chance to drop a black heart when killed.

Name: Marked
Description: Isaac will now fire tears automatically directed at a red target on the ground which is controlled by the player. This allows for a full 360 degree tear firing radius. Can be overridden by other tear modifiers such as Mom's Knife or Brimstone.

Name: Tech X
Description: Tears are replaced with laser rings that pierce through enemies and deal damage to enemies within them. Can be charged to increase the size of the ring.

Name: Ventricle Razor
Description: Can be used to place an orange portal and a blue portal. Upon entering a portal, Isaac is teleported to the other portal.

Name: Tractor Beam
Description: Isaac emits a beam from his face. Isaac's tears travel in the path of the beam.

Name: God's Flesh
Description: Tears now have a random chance to apply a shrinking effect, causing enemies to shrink in size and also run away from Isaac. Shrunk enemies can be crushed and killed by walking over them.

Name: Maw of the Void
Description: +1.0 Damage Up. After continuously firing tears for 2.5 seconds, a red cross appears on Isaac's head that, upon releasing the fire button, creates a black ring that rapidly deals damage equal to Isaac's tear damage to any enemies in contact with it.

Name: Spear of Destiny
Description: In addition to tears, Isaac now holds a spear in front of him which deals damage equal to 2 times his tear damage, and occasionally inflicts fear. The spear cannot be thrown, but deals damage while it is in contact with an enemy.

Name: Explosivo
Description: Isaac's tears have a chance to stick to enemies and explode.

Name: Chaos
Description: Chaos causes items to be chosen from random item pools. When picked up, drops between 1-6 random pickups on the floor.

Name: Spider Mod
Description: Displays Isaac's tear damage and enemy health bars. Spawns a gray spider familiar that wanders around and inflicts a random status effect on any enemies it comes into contact with. Occasionally spawns a blue spider upon clearing a room.

Name: Farting Baby
Description: A familiar that follows Isaac and blocks tears. If a tear hits Farting Baby, there is a high chance for it to fart, which will either knock back, poison, or charm all nearby enemies.

Name: GB Bug
Description: A glitch familiar that bounces around the room and applies a random status effect to any enemies it comes into contact with and has a chance to re-roll pickups that it passes over.

Name: D8
Description: Re-rolls Isaac's speed, range, tears, and damage.

Name: Purity
Description: This item will boost one of Isaac's stats depending on the color of the aura around him. The aura will disappear upon taking damage and will reappear with a random color upon entering a new room. A red aura boosts damage, a blue aura boosts rate of fire, a yellow aura boosts speed, and an orange aura boosts range.

Name: Athame
Description: Whenever Isaac takes damage, a black ring briefly appears around Isaac, dealing damage to all nearby enemies.

Name: Empty Vessel
Description: While Isaac has no red hearts, this item grants flight and a random chance to activate an invincibility shield for a few seconds. If Isaac gains any red hearts, these benefits will disappear.

Name: Evil Eye
Description: While firing tears, Isaac has a chance to fire an eye across the screen with a very slow shot speed, which will fire tears of its own in the same direction as Isaac. The eye will be destroyed if it comes into contact with an enemy or obstacle.

Name: Lusty Blood
Description: Each time Isaac kills an enemy, Isaac's damage increases for the current room.

Name: Cambion Conception
Description: After taking damage a certain amount of times, a permanent demonic familiar spawns.

Name: Immaculate Conception
Description: Upon picking up a certain amount of health, spawn a permanent angelic familiar.

Name: More Options
Description: Two items spawn in every Treasure Room. Only one can be taken; the other will disappear.

Name: Crown of Light
Description: Gives Isaac a crown that glows blue when active, and turns gray when inactive. While Isaac has no empty red heart containers, Isaac's tears are replaced with blue diamond tears that deal double damage. Regardless of health, the crown will deactivate for the current room when Isaac takes damage.

Name: Deep Pockets
Description: Allows Isaac to carry two cards or pills (or a combination of both) at the same time.

Name: Succubus
Description: Spawns a flying familiar that bounces around the room with a black aura, dealing rapid damage to any enemies inside it. While standing in the aura, Isaac gains a 1.5x tear damage multiplier.

Name: Fruit Cake
Description: Isaac's tears gain a random effect that changes every shot.

Name: Teleport 2.0
Description: Teleports Isaac to a random room that has not been explored yet when used. If all rooms are explored, including secret rooms, it will teleport Isaac to the Devil or Angel room. If all rooms are explored, including the Devil or Angel room, it will teleport Isaac to the I AM ERROR room. If used in a room with enemies, it will teleport Isaac out and back into the same room.

Name: Black Powder
Description: Isaac leaves a trail of black powder on the floor. Walking in a circle will spawn a pentagram symbol on the floor, which deals 10 damage per tick to any enemies inside it.

Name: Kidney Bean
Description: Upon use, Isaac farts, charming all nearby enemies.

Name: Glowing Hour Glass
Description: When used, this item will rewind time, put Isaac back in the previous room, and undo anything that happened in the current room. Any health, pickups, or items gained or lost will be reset back to the previous state.

Name: Circle of Protection
Description: Surrounds Isaac with a large white halo. Once per second, the halo deals Isaac's tear damage to enemies inside it. It may also convert enemy shots entering the halo into friendly purple homing tears.

Name: Sack Head
Description: Greatly increases the chance to find sacks.

Name: Night Light
Description: A cone of light shines in the direction Isaac is moving that slows enemies and enemy shots.

Name: Obsessed Fan
Description: A purple fly familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 3 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies.

Name: Mine Crafter
Description: Places an explosive TNT barrel that can be pushed and used to destroy rocks or damage enemies when used. If used a second time in the same room while the previous TNT barrel is still intact, it will remotely explode the TNT.

Name: PJs
Description: Grants four soul hearts and fully restores Isaac's red health.

Name: Head of the Keeper
Description: Isaac's tears become coins and now have a chance to drop pennies on the floor upon successfully hitting an enemy.

Name: Papa Fly
Description: A blue fly familiar follows Isaac's movements on a 3 second delay. Papa Fly will fire tears at nearby enemies.

Name: Multidimensional Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that will follow Isaac's movements on a 2.5 second delay. Tears that pass through the baby will be doubled and increase in speed.

Name: Glitter Bombs
Description: Gives Isaac 5 bombs, and makes Isaac's bombs have a chance to drop random pickups or charm enemies when they explode.

Name: My Shadow
Description: Each time Isaac takes damage, inflicts fear on all enemies in the room and spawns a black friendly Charger that will attack enemies. The Charger will be killed if it is damaged too much.

Name: Jar of Flies
Description: Every time Isaac kills an enemy, a fly will be added to the jar, up to a maximum of 20. Using the Jar of Flies will release all the flies that are currently in the jar as friendly blue flies that will damage enemies.

Name: Lil' Loki
Description: A Loki familiar that follows Isaac and shoots 4 tears in a cross pattern.

Name: Milk!
Description: A glass of milk follows Isaac and spills on the floor upon taking damage. After the milk spills, Isaac's tear delay is decreased by 2 for the rest of the room.

Name: D7
Description: Restarts the current room and brings back all enemies, allowing more rewards to be acquired by completing the room.

Name: Binky
Description: Tears up, adds 1 soul heart, and decreases Isaac's size.

Name: Mom's Box
Description: When used, Mom's Box will drop a random trinket on the ground. While held, increases luck by 1 and doubles the effects of trinkets.

Name: Kidney Stone
Description: Randomly while firing tears, Isaac will stop firing and turn red, where he will charge and release a lot of 'tears' in one go. In the burst of tears is a kidney stone which deals a lot of damage.

Name: Mega Blast
Description: Upon use, Isaac fires a laser similar to the one used by Mega Satan. This laser deals massive damage, lasts for approximately 15 seconds, and persists between rooms. Isaac is pushed backwards by the force of the laser while it is active.

Name: Dark Prince's Crown
Description: Increases range, tears, and shot speed when at exactly one red heart.

Name: Apple!
Description: Increases tears. Adds a chance to fire a high-damage razor blade.

Name: Lead Pencil
Description: After every 15 tears fired, Isaac will fire a high-damage cluster of tears.

Name: Dog Tooth
Description: Increases damage and speed. Upon entering a room adjacent to a secret room, a howl sound effect will play.

Name: Dead Tooth
Description: While firing, Isaac gains a green aura that poisons nearby enemies.

Name: Linger Bean
Description: Adds a chance to fire a gas cloud that damages nearby enemies.

Name: Shard of Glass
Description: Upon taking damage, Isaac has a chance to drop a full red heart, gain 5 range, and leave a trail of damaging red creep for the current room.

Name: Metal Plate
Description: Adds a chance to reflect enemy shots. Grants one soul heart.

Name: Eye of Greed
Description: Adds a chance to fire tears that temporarily stun enemies and turn them into gold. Any enemy killed while in this state will drop coins.

Name: Tarot Cloth
Description: Drops a random card or rune. Doubles the effects of cards and runes.

Name: Varicose Veins
Description: Taking damage releases a ring of 10 high damage tears.

Name: Compound Fracture
Description: Increases range. Tears turn into bones, which shatter into 1-3 bone shards upon hitting an enemy or obstacle.

Name: Polydactyly
Description: Allows Isaac to carry two cards, pills, or any combination of both at the same time. Drops a random card or pill.

Name: Dad's Lost Coin
Description: Increases range by 1.5. Drops a lucky penny.

Name: Moldy Bread
Description: Grants one full red heart container.

Name: Cone Head
Description: Grants a soul heart. Adds a chance to block enemy shots.

Name: Belly Button
Description: Drops a random trinket. Grants a second trinket slot.

Name: Sinus Infection
Description: Adds a chance to fire a booger which sticks to enemies and poisons them.

Name: Glaucoma
Description: Adds a chance to shoot concussive tears, causing enemies to walk around randomly.

Name: Parasitoid
Description: Adds a chance to fire an egg sack which spawns slowing creep and spawns a blue fly or spider upon hitting an enemy.

Name: Eye of Belial
Description: Grants piercing tears. After piercing one enemy, tears start homing and deal double damage.

Name: Sulfuric Acid
Description: Increases damage. Adds a chance to fire acidic tears which can destroy obstacles.

Name: Glyph of Balance
Description: Grants 2 soul hearts and modifies drops from Champion Monsters based on certain conditions.

Name: Analog Stick
Description: +0.3 tears up. Allows Isaac to fire tears diagonally.

Name: Contagion
Description: The first enemy killed in a room explodes and poisons nearby enemies. Poisoned enemies will also explode upon death.

Name: Finger!
Description: Spawns a finger familiar that points at enemies, dealing constant damage.

Name: Shade
Description: Spawns a shadow familiar that follows Isaac's movements on a 1 second delay and deals contact damage to enemies.

Name: Depression
Description: Spawns a cloud familiar that leaves a trail of tears that damages enemies. Has a chance to spawn damaging beams of light onto enemies that touch the cloud.

Name: Hushy
Description: Spawns a Hush familiar that bounces around the room and deals contact damage. While firing tears, it stops moving.

Name: Lil Monstro
Description: Spawns a familiar that fires clusters of tears. Must be charged before shooting.

Name: King Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that follows Isaac and makes other familiars follow it. While firing tears, it stops moving.

Name: Big Chubby
Description: Spawns a familiar that slowly charges forward and damages enemies in its path.

Name: Tonsil
Description: Grants a familiar that can block enemy shots.

Name: Plan C
Description: Kills all enemies in the room, then kills Isaac three seconds later.

Name: D1
Description: Duplicates a random pickup in the room.

Name: Void
Description: Consumes all pedestal items in the room. Active items will have their effects added to Void, and passive items will grant stat upgrades.

Name: Pause
Description: Freezes all enemies until a fire button is pressed.

Name: Smelter
Description: Consumes Isaac's currently held trinket and applies its effect permanently.

Name: Compost
Description: Spawns a blue spider or fly. Turns pickups in the room into blue spiders or flies.

Name: Dataminer
Description: Displaces enemy sprites for the current room, randomly increases one stat and decreases another.

Name: Clicker
Description: Transforms Isaac into another random character.

Name: Mama Mega!
Description: Damages all enemies and destroys all obstacles. The effect occurs every time a new room is entered for the rest of the floor. Opens doors to the floor's secret and super secret rooms.

Name: Wait What?
Subname: I can't believe it's not Butter Bean!
Description: Isaac farts, sending out rock waves.

Name: Crooked Penny
Description: Spawns a penny and has a 50% chance to double all items and pickups in the room. If the effect fails, the items and pickups disappear.

Name: Dull Razor
Description: Hurts Isaac without depleting health, activating any items that trigger upon taking damage.

Name: Potato Peeler
Description: Removes a heart container, increases damage and range, and grants a Cube of Meat.

Name: Metronome
Description: Grants a random item effect for the current room.

Name: D Infinity
Description: Grants a random dice item that changes each use.

Name: Eden's Soul
Description: Spawns two item pedestals.

Name: Acid Baby
Description: Spawns a familiar that drops random pills every 3 rooms cleared. Upon using a pill, all enemies in the room are poisoned.

Name: YO LISTEN!
Description: +1 luck. Spawns a fairy familiar that points out secret room entrances and tinted rocks.

Name: Adrenaline
Description: Increases damage based on how many empty heart containers Isaac has.

Name: Jacob's Ladder
Description: Tears fire sparks of electricity in random directions upon hitting an obstacle or enemy.

Name: Ghost Pepper
Description: Adds a chance to shoot a fire that damages enemies and remains in place until it deals enough damage or the room is left.

Name: Euthanasia
Description: Adds a chance to fire needles. If a needle kills an enemy, it bursts into more needles.

Name: Camo Undies
Description: Isaac becomes camouflaged at the beginning of each room. Enemies will not attack Isaac until he starts firing tears.

Name: Duality
Description: Whenever a Devil or Angel Room would spawn after defeating a boss, both rooms spawn. Only one can be entered.

Name: Eucharist
Description: An Angel Room door will always spawn after every boss fight, excluding the first floor and floors after Utero II/Womb II.

Name: Sack of Sacks
Description: Spawns a sack familiar that drops a sack upon clearing 5-6 rooms.

Name: Greed's Gullet
Description: Grants a heart container for every 25 coins Isaac has.

Name: Large Zit
Description: Adds a chance to fire a creep shot that deals double damage and leaves a trail of slowing white creep.

Name: Little Horn
Description: Adds a chance to fire a piercing tear that instantly kills any enemy that it touches.

Name: Brown Nugget
Description: Spawns a stationary fly familiar that fires tears at nearby enemies.

Name: Poke Go
Description: Upon entering a room with enemies in it, has a chance to spawn a random friendly enemy that persists across rooms.

Name: Backstabber
Description: Has a chance to fire tears that inflict bleeding on enemies, causing them to slowly take damage over time.

Name: Sharp Straw
Description: Damages all enemies in the room.

Name: Mom's Razor
Description: Spawns an orbiting razor that damages enemies it touches and inflicts bleeding on enemies, causing them to slowly take damage over time.

Name: Bloodshot Eye
Description: Spawns an orbiting eye familiar that fires tears every 2 seconds.

Name: Delirious
Description: Spawns a random charmed boss.

Name: Angry Fly
Description: Spawns a fly familiar that orbits around a random enemy and deals 5 damage per tick to enemies it comes in contact with.

Name: Black Hole
Description: Throws a black hole on the ground which sucks in and damages enemies.

Name: Bozo
Description: Increases damage by a flat 0.1 and grants a soul heart. Enemies can randomly become briefly charmed or feared. Taking damage has a chance to spawn a rainbow poop.

Name: Broken Modem
Description: Enemies, enemy shots, tears, and pickups will briefly freeze in place at random intervals.

Name: Mystery Gift
Description: Upon use, spawns a random item from the current room's item pool, with a chance to spawn A Lump of Coal or The Poop instead.

Name: Sprinkler
Description: Upon use, spawns a sprinkler that rotates and fires tears.

Name: Fast Bombs
Description: Grants 7 bombs and allows bombs to be placed rapidly.

Name: Buddy in a Box
Description: Grants a familiar with a random tear effect. The familiar is randomized at the start of each floor.

Name: Lil Delirium
Description: Grants a familiar that transforms into another random familiar every 10 seconds.

Name: Jumper Cables
Description: Grants an active item charge every 15 enemies killed.

Name: Coupon
Description: Upon use, makes a random item from a shop, devil deal, or black market free.

Name: Telekinesis
Description: Upon use, for the next two seconds, any enemy shots that come near Isaac are held in place. After the charge is depleted, they are fired back as tears.

Name: Moving Box
Description: If the box is empty, picks up all items and pickups in a room and stores them. If the box is not empty, places all stored items and pickups in the current room.

Name: Technology Zero
Description: Connects Isaac's tears with electricity that can damage enemies.

Name: Leprosy
Description: Upon taking damage, grants a body part as an orbital, which blocks enemy shots and deals 7 damage per tick to enemies it comes in contact with. The orbitals will be destroyed if they take enough damage from enemies or enemy shots.

Name: 7 Seals
Description: Grants a random Harbinger familiar that changes every 10 seconds.

Name: Mr. ME!
Description: Summons a controllable ghost that can perform various tasks depending on what it targets.

Name: Angelic Prism
Description: Grants a prism orbital with a large orbital radius. Tears that pass through the prism split into four multi-colored tears.

Name: Pop!
Description: Replaces Isaac's tears with eyeballs that can bounce off of each other. The eyeballs are not limited by range, and will instead dissipate when they stop moving or when hitting an enemy or obstacle.

Name: Death's List
Description: Grants a reward if all enemies in a room are killed in the order they are marked.

Name: Haemolacria
Description: Tears are now fired in an arc. Upon hitting the floor, an obstacle, or an enemy, they burst into many smaller tears in all directions. Increases tear delay.

Name: Lachryphagy
Description: Isaac's tears decelerate as they travel. Upon stopping or hitting an obstacle, they burst into 8 tears in all directions. Tears can be fired into other tears to feed them, increasing their damage.

Name: Trisagion
Description: Tears are replaced with piercing white blasts of light.

Name: Schoolbag
Description: Allows Isaac to hold two active items.

Name: Blanket
Description: Grants one soul heart. Upon entering a boss room, grants a shield that blocks one hit, then disappears.

Name: Sacrificial Altar
Description: Upon use, sacrifices up to 2 familiars and spawns an item from the Devil Room Pool for each familiar sacrificed.

Name: Lil Spewer
Description: Spawns a random pill, and grants a small Spewer familiar that charges up and fires different types of creep.

Name: Marbles
Description: Spawns 3 random trinkets. Taking damage has a small chance to swallow Isaac's currently held trinket, gaining its effect permanently.

Name: Mystery Egg
Description: Spawns an egg familiar, which cracks and turns into a random friendly enemy when Isaac is hurt. The egg regenerates upon entering a different room.

Name: Flat Stone
Description: Tears bounce off the floor. Tears that hit an enemy after bouncing deal splash damage to all nearby enemies for 25% of Isaac's tear damage.

Name: Marrow
Description: Grants one bone heart and spawns three red heart pickups.

Name: Slipped Rib
Description: Spawns a bone familiar that circles around Isaac and reflects enemy shots.

Name: Hallowed Ground
Description: Spawns a white poop familiar, which turns into a white poop when Isaac is hurt.

Name: Pointy Rib
Description: Spawns a bone familiar that can be aimed with the fire buttons and does contact damage.

Name: Book of the Dead
Description: Upon use, spawns a friendly Bony or an orbital bone for each enemy killed in the current room.

Name: Dad's Ring
Description: Creates a ring of light around Isaac that petrifies enemies in contact.

Name: Divorce Papers
Description: Spawns a Mysterious Paper, increases tears, and grants a bone heart.

Name: Jaw Bone
Description: Spawns a familiar that flies the room while firing, dealing a flat 7 damage to enemies that come in contact and retrieving pickups.

Name: Brittle Bones
Description: Replaces all red hearts with 6 empty bone hearts. Upon losing a bone heart, Isaac fires bones in 8 directions and permanently gains a tears up.

Name: Broken Shovel
Description: While held, causes multiple Mom's Foots to come down and stomp on Isaac. One of two parts necessary to create Mom's Shovel.

Name: Broken Shovel
Description: One of two parts necessary to create Mom's Shovel.

Name: Mom's Shovel
Description: Spawns a trapdoor that leads to the next floor upon activation. Unlocks The Forgotten when used on a mound of dirt that appears in Dark Room.
